lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin, the star forward and Pittsburgh Penguins draft pick who has said repeatedly he wants to play in the N.H.L., left his Russian pro team during a training camp in Finland yesterday, various Russian news services reported.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin, the star forward and Pittsburgh Penguins draft pick who has said repeatedly he wants to play in the N.H.L., left his Russian pro team during a training camp in Finland yesterday, various Russian news services reported.
